sub_title: Senior Global Solutions Architect at Equinix
summary:
Technical Sales professional leveraging his skills with a consultative approach. Develops opportunities and prospects by understanding requirements and creating solutions to complex business challenges. Aims for customer satisfaction whilst achieving quotas and driving business and solution development. 

Skills include:
•	High-level design, statements of work and bills of materials.
•	Pre-sales: workshops, whiteboard sessions and solution briefings. 
•	Sales and strategic account planning.
•	Vertical marketing and business development.
•	Speaking at events and discussion moderation.

treasury_media.title: De weg naar financiële inclusiviteit via cryptovaluta en digitale ecosystemen
treasury_media.description: Succesvolle uitwisseling van betalingsdata vereist veilige, robuuste digitale infrastructuur en ecosystemen die veilige, efficiënte en veerkrachtige connectiviteit tussen de spelers in de waardeketen mogelijk maken.

treasury_media.title: How to Fight DDoS and Ransomware Attacks with Interconnection - Interconnections - The Equinix Blog
treasury_media.description:
Virtual connections protect against ransomware attacks via backup air-gapping
Moving scrubbed data via interconnection enables more reliable DDoS mitigation services

treasury_media.title: TechTalk November 2020 Scaling with NSPs in Minutes
treasury_media.description: Do you want to learn how to scale your #network requirements quickly and efficiently? Watch the recording of this shortTechTalk: Solutions Architect @Michel Ludolph will review how you can address #network related stress with powerful #interconnection solutions. https://fply.co/91bb5b3

treasury_media.title: How to Meet VPN Demands by Leveraging Microsoft Azure Connectivity | Equinix Webinar
treasury_media.description: In this webinar, Michel Ludolph, Global Solutions Architect with Equinix will talk about how to overcome your business's fast-changing scalability challenges with Equinix Cloud Exchange Fabric™ (ECX Fabric™) and Microsoft Azure.

treasury_media.title: Het nieuwe financiële paradigma vraagt meer flexibiliteit van banken
treasury_media.description: Het nieuwe financiële paradigma vraagt meer flexibiliteit van banken   Consumentenbanken staan op een kruispunt nu een aantal bankdiensten overbodig dreigt te raken.

treasury_media.title: Dichterbij de burger met digitalisering - Interconnections - The Equinix Blog
SDN geeft overheden een ‘Tactical Edge’
treasury_media.description: Wide Area Networks (WANs) zijn van oudsher traditionele IT-infrastructuren waarbij de dienstverlening door gevestigde partijen geleverd wordt. De laatste jaren doet zich een trendbreuk voor: waar tot nog toe het WAN vooral vanuit een centrale/top-down...

certifications.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate (SAA-C02): 1 Cloud Services Overview

profile_positions.description:
Equinix is an American multinational company headquartered in Redwood City, California, that specializes in Internet connection, platform services, on-demand private connectivity and data centers. The company is a leader in the global colocation data center market, with 248 data centers in 27 countries on five continents.

Architecting for the digital edge in a pre-sales role supporting the Benelux Field Sales team. Focusing on Enterprise prospects and customers. This is a versatile role that includes solution design, providing workshops/briefings, marketing support, public speaking, discussion moderation and writing whitepapers and blogs. First and foremost I act as a trusted advisor, engaging with prospects and customers to understand their (hidden) needs in order to strategically advise on their IT Roadmap.
profile_positions.title: Senior Global Solutions Architect (GSA)

profile_positions.description:
Telefonica Global Solutions provides global telecommunication services for multinationals including IPVPN, Metro-Ethernet, IPX/IP-Transit, Carrier Wholesale, CDN, VoIP & hosted PBX, Cloud Connectivity, Cisco HCS, IPVPN, Ethernet, Voice, Video, Security, WiFi, Mobile & Satellite Services.

Responsible for:
- Presales, network design and quoting of WAN, LAN, Fixed and Mobile Voice-, Call-, Datacenter and Cloud solutions.
- Responding to RFP's (IP-VPN & Mobile).
- Infrastructure outsourcing & transformation design.
- Engaging with local customers and suppliers exploring and negotiating the most cost effective offerings.
- Selecting and developing interconnections with national carriers.
- Industry focus: Distribution & Logistics and Security Outsourcing.
profile_positions.title: Business Technical Consultant (BTC)

profile_positions.description:
France-based Orange Business Services is a subsidiary of the France Telecom group, offering IP, data, mobility and voice services for businesses, carriers and consumers around the world. Known as Equant before 2006.

Responsible for:
- Service development pertaining to performance management solutions and troubleshooting.
- Solution design, answering Request for Proposals (RFP) and presenting bids in a pre-sales role. Solutions include MPLS/IPVPN, Remote Access, VOIP & IPT, WAN Acceleration and Network Visibility solutions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Solution Consultant

profile_positions.description:
BT INS provides network consulting services and business solutions with respect to network infrastructures, security, and network & systems management. BT INS was formerly known as International Network Services (INS), founded in 1991 and based in Santa Clara, California with additional offices in the United States and Europe.

Responsible for:
- Scoping, pricing and conducting performance engineering projects in support of the INS professional services organization.
- Customer performance troubleshooting, network baselining, capacity management and VOIP readiness assessments.
- Performance Engineering and Application Optimization Practice / APM Leadership including conducting job interviews, organizing and training consultancy bootcamps, conducting periodical conference calls and representing the EMEA region in global calls.
- Designing WAN/LAN & DNS infrastructures, WAN Acceleration, network management and IP-Address management (IPAM) solutions.

Hands-on with Ethereal / Wireshark, OPNET-, Compuware- / Dynatrace- and Riverbed suite.
Industry focus: Air&Transportation and Oil&Gas industry (SITA, Shell).
profile_positions.title: Principal Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Atos Origin conducts IT business through three service lines: consulting, systems integration and managed operations.

Within the consulting line responsible for:
- Pre- and post merger network integration design and deployment.
- Proof of Concepts and performance consultancy pertaining to real time distributed systems, major on-line banking portals, web services, IBM Websphere /J2EE and Siebel.
- Network- & Web security management.
- Cisco router and switch and HP-Unix system configuration & management.
- DNS, Firewall and Proxy server management.

Hands-on with Cisco, HP-UX, Netscape, Bluecoat and Checkpoint suite, Perl- & Shell scripting.
Industry focus: Banking & Finance industry  (ING, ABNAMRO, AkzoNobel, Leaseplan).
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Pink Elephant is a Netherlands based ITSM (IT Service Management) company known for introducing ITIL and Prince2 on the European market. 

Responsible for Cisco router based network management within the Telecommunications industry (AT&T).
profile_positions.title: Network Administrator
